name: OS | FreeBSD | Network | IP | ARP Moved (SYSLOG)

patterns.value_re: kernel: arp: (?P<ip>\S+) moved from (?P<from_mac>\S+) to (?P<to_mac>\S+) on (?P<interface>\S+)?

name: OS | FreeBSD | Network | IP | IP Flap (SYSLOG)
description: kernel: arp: 193.34.20.5 is on em0 but got reply from 00:e0:81:b8:62:db on em1

patterns.value_re: kernel: arp: (?P<ip>\S+) is on (?P<from_interface>\S+) but got reply from (?P<mac>\S+) on (?P<to_interface>\S+)$
